display_information.name: Contract Translation Automation
display_information.description: This is a Contract Translation Automation application for transaltion of the legal contracts used by the Legal Team.
display_information.long_description:
Contract Translation Automation application will solve critical problems faced by Legal departments.
1. Most Legal departments often face problems finding a proper and efficient system to translate, review, process contracts automatically. 
2. Lack of such system in-place results in manual intervention for better understanding of the contracts. 
3. Managing and Monitoring the contracts is extensive and laborious without a proper Case Manager workflow in place. 
4. Usually different systems manage different stages of a Contract Management Lifecycle - making it tedious to collect and associate information and artifacts related to a particular contract case. "
